__metainf__.description: Configuration file of the waveform fitting tool of Sentinel-6 P4 L1 GPP - CCN 3

run_L2.description: Run L2 processor for each of the baselines to be analyzed. If 0, input_path_L2_ISR_bs corresponding flag must be specified. Set LRM to 1

L2proc.description: L2 processor being used (flag values: ISD, GPP)

plot_fitted_waveforms_bs.description: Plot fitted waveforms of each baseline

figure_format.description: Flag to indicate the type of output figure to be generated (png, jpg, eps)

res_fig.description: Flag to indicate the resolution of output figures to be generated

color_bs.description: Color palette to be used in output figures - colorblind

plot_downsampling.description: Downsampling of the surfaces to be ploted: every each number of surfaces the plot is generated and saved

text_interpreter.description: Flag to indicate the text font interpreter in output figures (tex, latex)

default_fontsize.description: Flag to indicate the fontsize of output figure to be generated

textbox_fontsize.description: Flag to indicate the fontsize of text in boxes of output figures

legend_fontsize.description: Flag to indicate the fontsize of legends in boxes of output figures

default_fontname.description: Flag to indicate the fontname of text in output figures

default_figuresize.description: Flag to indicate the size of output figures

default_linewidth.description: Flag to indicate the linewidth of lines in output figures

overlay_baselines.description: Flag to indicate whether waveforms of different baselines shall be added in the same output figure

num_pools.description: Flag to indicate the number of pools to be used in parallel computing

default_markersize.description: Flag to indicate the size of marks in the output figures of geophysical estimates

LineStyle.description: Flag to indicate the line style connecting marks in the output figures of geophysical estimates

marker_bs.description: Flag to indicate the marker style in the output figures of geophysical estimates

win_size_detrending.description: Size of the window (number of surfaces) to compute statistics of geophysical parameters estimates

flag_outliers_removal.description: Flag to indicate whether outliers of geophysical estimates shall be removed fromm the sample for the statisical analysis

type_outliers_removal.description: Flag to indicate the definition of outliers used if outliers are removed. Only Tukey's fences definition is considered

smooth_param.description: Flag to indicate whether smoothing (with win_size_detrending window size) is performed in the statistical analysis of geophysical estimates

generate_plots.description: Flag to indicate whether output plots shall be generated

generate_plot_SSH.description: Flag to indicate whether SSH plots shall be generated

generate_plot_SWH.description: Flag to indicate whether SWH plots shall be generated

generate_plot_sigma0.description: Flag to indicate whether sigma^0 plots shall be generated

generate_plot_COR.description: Flag to indicate whether Pearson correlation plots shall be generated

filter_ISR_baselines_mask.description: Flag that activates filtering with a Mask. Not used in this version

performance_latitude_range.description: Range of min and max latitudes of retrieved parameters to be analyzed

save_figure_format_fig.description: Flag to indicate whether output figures in .fig format shall be generated

input_path_L1_ISR_bs.description: String array containing path to the input L1B product files according to the name_bs order

input_path_L2_ISR_bs.description: String array containing path to the input L2 product files according to the name_bs order. Strings shall be empty if the tool runs the L2 processor for the corresponding baseline. In that case, the string or path will correspond to output_path_L2_ISR_bs

output_data_path.description: File system path to the directory containing the output products generated by the tool

path_to_L2_processor.description: File system path to the directory containing the L2 HR processor source code

cnf_chd_cst_path.description: Path to the directory containing the different configuration, characterization and constant definition files, and the Look Up Tables (LUTs) for the f0 and f1 functions to be used by the power waveform fitting routine
